law.catch_line: If the Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City or the governing body of a county or of a municipal ...
law.text:
If the Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City or the governing body of a county or of a municipal corporation authorizes, by law, the stock in business consisting of foreign imports of a business engaged in importing is not subject to county or municipal corporation property tax if the foreign import is:
in the possession of the business engaged in importing; and
in its original package.
